message.name: ERR_FV_COMMENT_LONGER_THAN_ALLOWED_LIMIT
message.locale: The comment entered exceeds the allowed limit.

message.name: ERR_FV_CONCERN_ROLE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The concern role must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMMENT_RELATED_TYPE_MANDATORY
message.locale: The comment related type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMMENT_RELATED_OBJECT_MANDATORY
message.locale: The comment related object identifier must be specified.
